Package Main

Class DatabaseConnectionManager

java.lang.Object
Main.DatabaseConnectionManager
public class DatabaseConnectionManager extends Object
Created class DatabaseConnectionManager.java

This class manages the connections to the database. It also stores the user's username.

Author:
Jamie Barbour-Moore

    • databaseUsername

      private static String databaseUsername
      A string containing the value for the username for the database credentials. Value is fetched from environment variable with "GSA_DB_User" Key

    • databasePassword

      private static String databasePassword
      A string containing the value for password for the database credentials. Value is fetched from environment variable with "GSA_DB_Password" Key

  • Constructor Details

    • DatabaseConnectionManager

      public DatabaseConnectionManager()

  • Method Details

    • makeConnection

      public static void makeConnection()
      This method makes a connection with the database. The Username and Password for the database connection are pulled from the System Environment Variables GSA_DB_User and GSA_DB_Password

    • getConnection

      public static Connection getConnection()
      This method gets the connection.
      Returns:
      the connection with the database

    • closeConnection

      public static void closeConnection()
      This method closes the connection with the database.

    • makePreparedStatement

      public static void makePreparedStatement(String sqlStatement, Connection conn) throws SQLException
      This method creates a prepared statement given sql and connection.
      Parameters:
      sqlStatement - The sql for the statement
      conn - The connection
      Throws:
      SQLException - if the database access fails

    • getPreparedStatement

      public static PreparedStatement getPreparedStatement() throws SQLException
      This method gets the prepared statement. If there is not a prepared statement it returns null.
      Returns:
      the prepared statment
      Throws:
      SQLException - if the database connection fails

    • getCurrentUser

      public static String getCurrentUser()
      This method gets the current user.
      Returns:
      the current user

    • setCurrentUser

      public static void setCurrentUser(String currentUser)
      This method sets the current user.
      Parameters:
      currentUser - the new current user
